Name: [Affinity] Full Firepower
Desc: Nicole has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Field Expansion]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo.
Desc2: If fear towards the enemy often stems from a lack of firepower, then Nicole flexing full firepower is what instills fear in them.
